sub_title: Experienced Aerospace Engineer, Regional/International Sustainable Technology Supporter
summary:
• Regional, International Aero, Marine & Sustainable Technology project focus.
• BSc. Hons. Mechanical Engineering (UK)  
• European / North American commercial aerospace programmes (EADS/Airbus, Boeing, Com Dev).
• Design, Static / Dynamic Finite Element Analysis, Mechanical Test Coordination. 
• Business Development, Project Management.

Specialities: 
• Business Development / Strategic International Outreach
• Project Engineering / Project Management 
• Advanced Level Static/Dynamic Finite Element Analysis (Patran/Nastran) - light weight metallic / composite structures.

company.name: Based in the Pacific North West.

profile_positions.company: Based in the Pacific North West.
profile_positions.description: Advisor / Consultant / Investor :- Regional / global marine, green-clean-tech project support.
profile_positions.title: Aerospace Engineer / Sustainable Tech Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Business Development Group – Staff Engineer                  
• Lead coordinator of preliminary static, dynamic sizing and flow induced vibration assessments to support next generation (VAFN) aero-engine nacelle design proposal submittals to Boeing/Rolls Royce management.

Boeing 787 Nacelle Program - Staff Engineer	               
• ‘Common Phase’ Participant / Lead Structural Dynamics Engineer.
• Structural sizing - modal/forced transient, impact, sonic fatigue analyses.
• Technical coordination lead with customers, suppliers on advanced material selection, joining and analysis techniques.
• Integral Test Engineer outlining blade out, bird strike, ground and flight engine tests.
• Certification report preparation.
 
EADS Airbus A380 Program Representative, Toulouse, France - ‘Common Phase’ Assignment - Staff Engineer		
• Senior company representative performing stress, structural dynamic (modal, transient, sonic fatigue) and thermal analysis of numerous wing pylon designs. 
• Technical on site stress/dynamics engineer with Goodrich (San Diego) and Rolls-Royce (UK) / GE (Ohio).

Technical Support Group - Staff Engineer     	        
• Cognizant thermal and structural dynamics engineer on in-house EADS Airbus / Boeing / Embraer aero-engine nacelle programmes (A320 - A340 / B737-800 / ERJ 145-190). 
• Generated, optimized finite element models to assess dynamic environmental (modal / forced transient) loads for design life assessment, FAA / CAA certification. 
• Lead engineer on in-service root cause failure analyses / re-design studies. 
• Technical test lead engineer coordinating material, modal tap, engine (on wing / engine test cells), sonic fatigue tests, associated response data interpretation & reporting. 
• Analysis/test correlation study participation - X33 space vehicle external skin - for NASA / Lockheed Martin.
profile_positions.title: Staff Engineer

profile_positions.description:
• Integral team member supporting proposal, design, mechanical, thermal analysis and test evaluation of microwave multiplexers for commercial research / telecommunication satellites.
• Simulated sinusoidal, random, thermal load environments, imposed during launch and orbit using finite element techniques. 
• Results presented at CDR level to multi-national customers. 
• Supporting task responsibilities - design and assessment of vibration test fixtures, supervision of environmental tests to qualification / proto-flight levels (CRC Ottawa) and material process investigations.
profile_positions.title: Advance Member, Technical Staff
